{
    'name': 'Peru - Accounting',
    'description': """
Peruvian accounting chart and tax localization. According the PCGE 2010.
========================================================================

SUNAT 2011 (PCGE 2010).

    """,

        'data/account_data.xml',
        'data/account_tax_data.xml',
        'data/account_chart_template_data.yml',
    ],
}
